title: Clearlake’s Pretium Packaging Clinches Deal to Restructure Debt
description: Clearlake Capital Group-owned bottle and jar manufacturer Pretium Packaging reached a deal with a majority group of lenders to restructure its debt and continue operating, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
content: Clearlake Capital Group-owned bottle and jar manufacturer Pretium Packaging reached a deal with a majority group of lenders to restructure its debt and continue operating, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
